subject: Belmont Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner is unbeaten while wearing a nasal strip, but the New York stewards disallowed the breathing aid for a previous Triple Crown contender.
snippet: The Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner is unbeaten while wearing a nasal strip, but the New York stewards disallowed the breathing aid for a previous Triple Crown contender.
